tasks.title: Authentication UI Integration
tasks.description: Create complete authentication UI with login, registration, protected routes, and user management integration

deliverables_completed: ✅ Login page with email/password form and validation
✅ Registration page with password strength indicator
✅ Password reset page with success flow
✅ Protected route component with redirect logic
✅ User menu with profile display and logout
✅ TypeScript types and API client architecture
✅ Loading states for all async operations
enhanced_features_delivered: Password strength indicator with real-time feedback

technical_implementation.architecture: React Hook Form + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS

files_created: lib/api/auth.ts - API client with mock fallback
components/Layout.tsx - Main app layout with navigation
integration_completed: Existing process page protected with authentication
Navigation updated with sign in/out functionality
Consistent design language with existing pages

tasks.next_steps: Ready for review and backend integration with CC's auth endpoints

tasks.title: Repository Cleanup & Documentation Organization
tasks.description: Clean up and organize the autopilot repository, archiving old documentation and creating a clean structure for production

context.goal: Create clean, organized repository structure for production

deliverables: Create archive index for easy reference
Ensure only production-relevant files remain visible
tasks.signals_when_done: Repository is clean, organized, with clear structure and archived history
tasks.special_instructions: Use the cleanup script but enhance as needed for better organization
tasks.process_reminder: Update status to 'in_progress' when starting, 'ready_for_review' when complete
